task.en: Create a trailer in iMovie and select the template with a black background and the word "BLOCKBUSTER" in the same font as Jurassic Park. Then return to the Projects page and save the template as "Jurassic Empty Template".
task.zh: 在iMovie剪辑中创建一个故事板，选择一个现成的模板。模板的缩略图是黑色的背景，上面有《侏罗纪公园》同款字体写着的BLOCKBUSTER字样。创建后，退出并回到项目界面。在保存时，将项目命名为Jurassic Empty Template。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/
grading_command: [ -e "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary/Jurassic Empty Template/Original Media/SoundTrack-Blockbuster4.m4a" ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
